txt.en: While searching Lugvarg for the \qevidence\q the road-watchers spoke of, you have discovered that Lugvarg guards a pass from the battlement of Magh Ashtu in Dor Amarth.\n\nIf the Free Peoples intend to stage a large incursion into Lhingris in the coming days, the way must be made clear.

Orkish warriors and sentries can be found at the watch-tower of Lugvarg along the Morgai in Rath Cail.\n\nYou have come to Lugvarg in search of rumoured belongings of Frodo or Sam, and have found that the watch-tower guards the pass to Magh Ashtu in Dor Amarth. You should defeat many of the Orcs in Lugvarg.
You have defeated many of the Orcs in Lugvarg.
The watch-tower of Lugvarg guards the pass from Magh Ashtu into Lhingris, and its Orcs keep a close watch on those who dare travel in the shadow of the Morgai.
You have defeated many of the Orcs at Lugvarg and made clear the road to Magh Ashtu in Dor Amarth.
